title: Grease: Live: Mario Lopez to Play TV Host Vince Fontaine in Fox Musical
text:
Grease: Live: Mario Lopez to Play TV Host Vince Fontaine in Fox Musical 
Published By: TVLine.com - Today 
Grease is the word for Mario Lopez — and we’re not just talking about the amount of product in his sleek ‘do. The TV and radio persona...
